attributes.action: Provide more funding for the public services, police, NHS and education and cut private sector rather than public sector jobs to save he UK budget.
attributes.additional_details: Stop the cutting of jobs in the public sector, that are needed such as police, health service and education. Instead cut down private sector budgets. Cutting the services that are needed for a country to run is giong to be debtrimental. All public sector jobs need to be saved.
